full_text:
SUBTERFUGE.

	It shall be an unlawful discriminatory practice to do any of the acts mentioned in this article for any reason which would not have been asserted, wholly or partially, but for the fact that the person against whom such assertions are made has the medical condition AIDS or any condition related thereto.

1.name: Prohibition Against Discrimination Based On A Person Suffering From The Medical Condition Aids, Or Any Medical Signs Or Symptoms Related Thereto, Or Any Perception That A Person Is Suffering From The Medical Condition Aids Whether Real Or Imaginary
1.label: article

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

SUBTERFUGE. (§ 45.88)

  SUBTERFUGE.	It shall be an unlawful discriminatory practice to do any of the
acts mentioned in this article for any reason which would not have been
asserted, wholly or partially, but for the fact that the person against whom
such assertions are made has the medical condition AIDS or any condition related
thereto.

SUBTERFUGE.

It shall be an unlawful discriminatory practice to do any of the acts mentioned in this article for any reason which would not have been asserted, wholly or partially, but for the fact that the person against whom such assertions are made has the medical condition AIDS or any condition related thereto.
